doc:
Didier Bourdon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Didier_Bourdon 0 Didier Bourdon (born 23 January 1959) is a French Algerian-born actor, screenwriter and film director.He first reached stardom in France when he created the comedic trio Les Inconnus with Bernard Campan and Pascal Légitimus, which was very popular throughout the 1990s. Didier_Bourdon ( born 23_January_1959 ) is a_French_Algerian-born_actor_,_screenwriter_and_film_director.He first reached stardom in France when he created the_comedic_trio_Les_Inconnus with Bernard_Campan and Pascal_Légitimus , which was very_popular throughout the_1990s .
